SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

seccommerce.secsignersigg
Interface SecSignerConstants

public interface SecSignerConstants

This class contains constant values for SecSigner.

Author:
SecCommerce Informationssysteme GmbH, Hamburg

Field Summary
static java.lang.String FILENAME_EXTENSION_PKCS7
          The file name extension for PKCS#7 signature files.
static java.lang.String JAR_FILENAME
          Filename of the program JAR-archive.
static java.lang.String JAR_QUAL_SIG_FILENAME
          Filename of the signature file of the content of all files in SecSigner.jar.
static java.lang.String PROP_VETO_CANCEL_SECSIGNER
          a property name for a PropertyVetoException thrown by a SmartCardInsertionListener to signal that not only the inserted card is rejected but SecSigner shall be canceled too
static java.lang.String PUB_PROP_FILE_NAME
          Filename of the public properties file.
static java.lang.String PUB_PROP_FILE_NAME_B
          Filename of the optional alternate public properties file.
static java.lang.String SEC_PROP_FILE_NAME
          Filename of the secure (resource) properties file.
static int SECSIGNER_DOCUMENT_HAS_NO_SIGNATURE
          error in verification process: document does not contain a signature which can happen when verifying pdf documents or xml dsig documents
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_ALGORITHM_EXPIRED
          verification process successful: signature cannot be validated because a crypto algorithm has expired
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_ALGORITHM_UNKNOWN
          signature cannot be validated because a crypto algorithm is not supported
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_CERTINVALID
          verification process successful: certificate is invalid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_CERTVALID
          verification process successful: certificate is valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_DATA_MISMATCH
          error in verification process: signed content was supplied and included in the signature and both are not equal
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_DECODE_FAILED
          error in verification process: ASN.1 decoding not possible
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_DECODED_UNSIGNED_DATA
          decryption process successful: data is NOT signed data
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_ERROR
          error in verification process
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_HASH_NOT_VALIDATED_BY_EVIDENCE_RECORD
          verification process NOT successful: the hash of the document is NOT contained in the evidence record or the evidence record is NOT valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_HASH_VALIDATED_BY_EVIDENCE_RECORD
          verification process successful: the hash of the document is contained in the evidence record and the evidence record is valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_NO_DATA
          error in verification process: signed content was neither supplied nor was it included in the signature
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_NOTINITED
          verification not done yet.
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_PDFA_COMPLIANT
          verified PDF document is PDF/A compatible
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_PDFA_NOT_COMPLIANT
          verified PDF-document is not PDF/A compatible
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_SIGNATUREINVALID
          verification process successful: signature is NOT valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_SIGNATUREVALID
          verification process successful: signature is valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_SIGNATUREVALID_CERTINVALID
          verification process successful: signature is valid, but the signer's cert is invalid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_SIGNATUREVALID_CERTREVOKED
          verification process successful: signature is valid, but the signer's cert is invalid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_SIGNATUREVALID_RESIGNED
          verification process successful: signature is valid and the user has signed the document again
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_TIMESTAMP_INVALID
          verification process successful: the timestamp for an unsigned document is NOT valid
static int SECSIGNER_VERIFY_TIMESTAMP_VALID
          verification process successful: the timestamp for an unsigned document is valid
static java.lang.String SECSIGNER_VERSION_NUMBER
          The version number of secsigner.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PDF
          Signature is inserted into the PDF file.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7
          PKCS#7 SignedData will be returned.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7_EMBEDDED
          Embedded PKCS#7 SignedData will be returned.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY
          Only the RSA signature will be returned.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_IDENTITY
          Deprecated. use SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY instead
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY
          Only the RSA signature will be returned.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_UTILITY
          Deprecated. use SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY instead
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_TIFF
          Signature is inserted into a tiff according the recommendation of AuthentiDate for embedded PKCS#7 signature in tiff documents.
static int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_XML_DSIG
          The document's hash, the signer's certificate, the RSA signature, and the signed Document (XML-DSig) will be returned.
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_BINARY
          sign data type binary
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_HTML
          sign data type: HTML
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_IMAGE
          sign data type: image
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_PDF
          sign data type: PDF
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_PLAINTEXT
          sign data type: plain text
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_RTF
          sign data type: Rich text format
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_XML
          sign data type: XML
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_ZIP
          sign data type zip-archive
static java.lang.Integer SIGNDATATYPE_ZKS
          sign data type: ZKS document

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7
PKCS#7 SignedData will be returned. The identity key is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY
Only the RSA signature will be returned. The signature key is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_IDENTITY

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_IDENTITY
Deprecated. use SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY instead
Only the RSA signature will be returned. The identity key is used.

See Also:
SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_SIG_KEY, Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY
Only the RSA signature will be returned. The authentication key is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_UTILITY

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_UTILITY
Deprecated. use SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY instead
Only the RSA signature will be returned. The authentication key is used.

See Also:
SIGNATURE_FORMAT_RAW_AUTH_KEY, Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PDF

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PDF
Signature is inserted into the PDF file.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_XML_DSIG

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_XML_DSIG
The document's hash, the signer's certificate, the RSA signature, and the signed Document (XML-DSig) will be returned. The identity key is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7_EMBEDDED

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_PKCS7_EMBEDDED
Embedded PKCS#7 SignedData will be returned. The identity key is used.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

SIGNATURE_FORMAT_TIFF

static final int SIGNATURE_FORMAT_TIFF
Signature is inserted into a tiff according the recommendation of AuthentiDate for embedded PKCS#7 signature in tiff documents.

See Also:
Hashwerte_zu_integrierten_Signaturen.pdf, Constant Field Values
